name: nodebp-sinopia
description: How to set up sinopia using docker

scripts.publish-gh: npm run build && git branch -D gh-pages; git checkout --orphan gh-pages && git rm -rf --ignore-unmatch node_modules index.jade .gitignore package.json && mv dist/* . && git add index.html arch.png && git commit -m 'Publish gh-pages' && git push --force origin gh-pages
